90771632.review:
This game saved my life.

I am 34.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

90545048.review:
Team Fortress 2 is my favorite game of all time and a shell of what it used to be. The game is downright unplayable outside of peak hours due to the thousands of bots flooding casual. Even within peak hours it's not uncommon to have to queue for several matches in a row until you find a playable one. Once you do find a playable match it's likely that half of the losing team will disconnect after the first round and they'll be replaced by bots. Either that or a single bot will join your team midgame, kick you, then it's back to searching for a playable match.

Despite what attention seeking tubers say, there is no secret update in development that's going to end the bot crisis and make TF2 great again. There's nothing in development at all, the game is abandoned, and it's your fault. If you still buy items from the Mann Co. Store, the Community Market, or rate this game positively, then you're telling Valve that everything is A-OK. Do yourself a favor and use your power as the consumer to vote with your wallet. Quit giving money to a developer who refuses to fix glaring issues in their game, because as long as you keep giving them money they'll have no incentive to fix them. Quit giving an unplayable game positive reviews. Hell, just quit playing TF2 in general. Maybe if enough people followed these steps it would light a fire under Valve's ass to fix the game, but until that day comes expect nothing to change.

90560202.review:
In its current state TF2 isn't exactly playable without 3rd party servers. I decided to load up since I haven't in a while and finding matches within the game itself is simply not do-able. It is riddled with bots ( Yes, ACTUAL bots and not real people) who just spin around and aimbot everyone. 

If you are lucky enough to que into a casual match without the blatant bots, you will most likely end up against closet cheaters who are very obviously cheating, but no one on the enemy team seems to really care what they do for the next 10 minutes just sitting around while the one guy stops all the pushes. I see all the drama around how many cheaters there are in this game, but when you don't atleast kick them out of the match your in then it just ruins the fun for everyone. Don't beat a dying horse and whine on how bad of a walk it was from here to there. Take care of it yourself and eventually you'll both end up where you want to be.

That being said though, I think in its current state something internal needs to be done. Until that happens, I believe I will keep this uninstalled. The core of this community is something I will enjoy always with the amazing modelling and 3D work that can come from this engine. The story and characters and all around fundamentals of the game will be used and enjoyed for years to come.

If you do want to enjoy this game, I highly suggest using FaceITs launcher as a way to get past all of the bots and cheaters in general. From what I hear they include other much needed changes to the game from the community feedback and all around just better experience. If you want a team shooter Overwatch is the next best thing imo.

Until next time Tf2!

Ce jeu ma fait connaitre beaucoup de personnes et je me suis tellement amusé sur les maps Mario Kart qu'il y avais avant... Ce jeu ma fait découvrir le monde du gaming sur PC... Ce jeu ma donné tellement d'émotions que ça soit de la rage ou le sentiment d'aider ton équipe a avancer et le travail d'équipe... J'ai passé des après-midi a exploser des gens avec le Soldier... Mais j'ai le regret de dire que le jeu est complètement mort... Valve ne font rien pour régler ce problème... et je pense qu'ils feront rien du tout pour le régler...

I've owned TF2 since 2009. It was a great game with original gameplay mechanics and you can tell that a lot of love and care went into the design and first few years of updates. 89933642.review:
Team Fortress 2 is one of the games I classify as an "Everybody" game. What I mean by that, is that everybody should be given a chance to play it at least once, whether it be at a friends house, just to try out, or even to play full session.

TF 2 is a free to play multiplayer FPS game. It isn't the stereotypical "shoot everything you see" game though. This game has nine playable classes to choose from. Every one of them has a unique aspect to them. I'm not going to spoil them for you, as a better approach, you should watch the "Meet The Classes" videos to get a better description of them.

Every class also has their individual weaknesses. Whether it be the Sniper and the Spy, or if it would be the medic and the soldier. Though the community isn't really based upon the basics of the game. They're are purchasable items that everybody and you even, will most likely want at some point. The hats. The coats. The accessories that that one person had that you wanted, but he just killed you and went on his way etc.

Resting my case on the items, they're are many styles of gameplay one can take on, making the game have no really OP (Overpowered) people in it. Team Fortress 2 focuses heavily on skill with the individual classes, and while the classes have they're own assortment of community made weapons to choose from, they're is still always something to over-counter it.

I have many hours in this game, I enjoy this game, I will probably continue to play this game for as long as i play video games but i can NOT recommend it, in fact i recommend not getting into it.
Valve does not give a **** about TF2, they are happy to allow 1/4th of the player base be bots and do nothing about it. The only reason I'm taking the time to review this forgotten relic of a game that Valve and Gabe seem to be ignoring on purpose is because I just had to hop to 7 servers in a row filled with bots before giving up and closing the game.
Bots will join, have other bots join and start to vote kick off any real human players, and if you think, "oh well just vote the bots off" then you haven't played this game, not only do they ruin the fun of the game you're in with blatant perfect tracking head-shots but should you decide to think yourself clever enough to vote off the bots they've been programmed to leave the server before the vote passes (nullifying the vote) and then immediately join back into the server.
The actual game itself is so good and downright fun, nothing in any other shooter compares to rocket jumping and landing a crit market gardener on an enemy medic as you become your own mortar, or tricking a whole team as a spy as you save the payload at the last minute by chaining 5 back-stabs in a row, there is so much good in this game but it is impossible to ignore the seemingly willful lack of care from valve and I blame no one but them for the terrible and frankly unacceptable state the game is in right now.
TLDR: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GAME, THE DEVELOPERS DO NOT CARE AND HAVE LET IT BECOME OVERRUN WITH INSTANT KILL BOTS.

Итог: Я люблю тф (но, пожалуйста, помогите избавиться от ботов).

91198392.review:
Beware!!! Hero Black Knight has only played this masterpiece for 590 hours, so the review might change and I will update it once I reach another milestone. This is my own review meaning it is on my own opinion after:

-590 hours playing many classes, so I like to play all classes to support the lack in team's variety.

-Watching many youtubers with different mains to get every main's perspective on TF2.

-Learning about the story of the characters and the game in depth by watching their stories and meeting them through meet the team videos which are considered to be a masterpiece.

-Searching about each class's guide by different youtuber mains to be able to play all classes which is considered to be an advantage to know all classes.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So you want to hear from the almighty Black Knight? 

Sure, I will tell you that Team Fortress 2 is not letting me play other games, for it proves to be more fun to play, and not to mention the story behind the characters we all loved to learn about in their meet videos just like the spy (My main probably)!
I even love this game with 20 fps that I play on because it is different than any type of shooter video games.
For example, I played Cod: Cold War on Ps5 and it did not give me the same feelings (I know it is on a console, but this is one of many examples of shooter games I played: battlefield (pc) mw2 - 3 (pc) etc).
The music of the game is so much iconic that if you hear it, then you will immediately know that it is a TF2 song since it has its unique style. From a gameplay perspective I can assure you that it all depends on movement which makes the game more exciting to play and enjoyable. The problem in TF2 is that it is officially dead from the official updates perspective. Bots everywhere making you rage-quit that you will probably won't comeback shortly after it due to the state TF2 has reached. 

Now. I will tell you my experience about each class and what is good for you as a beginner:
Let's begin with offensive classes that are not quite named right as people suggest.

The first class is scout and it is for people who like games that have speed as a major factor in them such as Sonic games, playing as scout rewards you for killing in close range since it is powerful enough in close range. For new players, scout will seem to be a fun class to play as until the point they come across soldiers, pyros, heavies, etc. 

Soldier is a class for mad people who like to scream all time due to the fact that you can fly using a literal rocket, but that is an advanced soldier play. I find soldier to be the most balanced class in all TF2 due to his health, speed, support, DPS, etc. As a beginner, soldier is a good class to begin with since you don't really need to activate your mind to play as soldier.

Pyro is the most class that is hated by people, and they often mention the class being too annoying against other classes, or that the class does not require anything other than the key W and Mouse 1, so people have a very bad opinion about pyro's class. It is an unbalanced class that needs to be totally reworked. Many people agree that pyro class is the best class for beginners since it does not require many knowledge or "skills", so it is the best option for "easy mode".

We finished offensive classes, now let's jump right into "defense" classes:

The first class is the demoman which is a class for people who like to play as a Scottish Cyclops while drunk since playing as demo is easy when you progress through the game. Demoman can place traps which can trick the enemy leading to their explosion. When I was a beginner, demoman class was the hardest class for me to play as for unknown reasons, so I do not think it is a good idea to start as him. However, when you reach certain hours of experience, playing as demo would be so much fun due to it's balanced stats excluding it's broken melee is used by the creepy beasts that are called Demoknights (subclass).

The heavy is the funniest character since he is a big boy with a large gun. I love heavy in capture mode since it is easy to kill everyone once knowing the right techniques against all classes. It is a balanced class with high health and damage with the lack of movement unlike the scout. I loved heavy when I was a beginner, but I got bored fast due to his speed (which is natural since I love movement). Heavy is easy to use, but beware that you are an easy target to spies and snipers even with that large health bar.

Engineer gamin- oh sorry, I meant the engineer is a class that gives you a new kind of gameplay since you are responsible of placing obstacles, for example sentries. I love that class since he has a complete defensive style that supports the whole team by blocking the path with sentries, and the team can heal fast using engineer's lovely building...THE DISPENSER to heal fast. For a beginner, an engineer is a begineer (from bad_jokes.com) meaning he is a perfect class for beginners since the class does not require you to aim, and you will most likely hear that from people that are dying to your sentries. A last comment about engineer would be...ENGINEER GAMING TEXAS STYLE...anyways.

Good JOB!! the last type of classes (it is not the last) is the support type of classes that include:

E, I mean the medic who is for people who want to raise their chances of a heart attack due to the stress the class receives from letter E. From my experience, I can confirm that medic is such a tense class to play as especially when playing with E spammers. You will most likely lose your mind after playing this class for a long time without a 10 hour break from the phobia of letter E. Beginners are not recommended to play as medic unless they can handle people's comments on how they lost due to you being not so much useful while they are walking in straight lines leading you to get head-shoted like them, anyways, I recommend playing as medic after watching some tips and tutorials since you will enter hell if you do not do otherwise.

Snipers AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH I HATE SNIPERS even though I am learning how to improve my skills (in 20 fps) Basically, their rate of OPiness is shown in TF2's current situation which is bots. Now, I know that playing as sniper is the hardest experience if you cannot aim, but if you know what to do, then you will wipe the whole enemy team without being stopped which is balanced since no one way really can nerf it more lol. As a beginner I see that if you have a good aim, then start learning about the techniques to fu- wipe the whole enemy team from existence. If you are not good at aiming, then sniper is not the best option for you. 

MOVING TO MY MAIN (MAYBE)

Ahhhh...spy...spy spy spy, chill character, funny character, has the second best meet the video (MY BLOODY OPINION) What can I say? Well, let us say that spy is a class that has a complete different gameplay other than mad helicopter (soldier) or boring waiting (engineer) Spy requires you to play strategically and you have to view everything around you before you can start the back stab. Spy has the disguising tool which can let you dress EXACTLY as one of the enemy's classes and you will sadly appear to be the most sus player between your enemies. Spy requires a lot of skill to be able to properly play as him since you have to literally outsmart the enemy team by getting behind them or by tricking them with godly skills that you backstab them even though you were in front of them and they knew it was you the imposter. What I like the most about spy is that he is a class that requires you to think of every movement your enemy does (you will most likely not think of it and end up dying). For beginners spy is the worst character to begin with since you have to learn more about him before playing.

That was my review and good luck on your TF2 adventure! Hail Black Knights!

91124812.review:
Что такое TF2?

TF2 это:

- Когда ты с 3 hp бежишь к аптечке, но ее подбирает твой сокомандник с 298 hp.

- Когда пускаешь критическую ракету в толпу врагов, но вражеский пиро ее отражает обратно.

- Когда ты горишь, остается 10 hp, а союзный пиро смотрит на тебя как баран на новые ворота.

- Когда ты бросаешь бутерброд еле живому медику, но его ловит вражеский невидимый шпион.

- Когда ты не можешь выйти со спауна из-за over 9000 липучек вражескх демо на выходе.

- Когда ты захватил 5,9 из 6 контрольных точек, а тебя перекидывает в другую команду.

- Когда ты борешься с шпионом за свою турель, а союзники не обращают на это внимания.

- Когда ты вошел в раш и ставишь хедшоты один за другим, за что тебя кикают за использование читов.

- Когда ты хорошо играешь за пиро или скаута, а тебя обвиняют за использование аим-бота.

- Когда ты, будучи медиком, лечишь союзника, а он собирает все аптечки в округе.

- Когда в твоем пулемете кончились патроны, а инженер перевел все запасы в округе на турель, так и не удосужившись построить раздатчик.

- Когда твоя команда не может завалить одну единственную вражескую пару медик-хевик.

- Когда тебя убивают насмешкой из-за угла.

- Когда вражеская команда не хочет танцевать с тобой конгу.

- Когда случайный удар топором противника по невидимому тебе оказывается критическим.

- Когда ваш единственный медик в команде не лечит союзников, а бегает с иглометом.

- Когда вражеский инженер разбил лагерь с телепортом в твоей комнате с разведданными.

- Когда вражеский шпион закалывает тебя в спину пока ты совершаешь насмешку.

- Когда тебе проламывает череп лопатой случайный прыгун.

- Когда ты, несмотря на все вышеперечисленное, приводишь свою команду к нелегкой победе и пишешь "gg" в чате.

90997659.review: Team Fortress 2 - Это шутер от первого (может быть и от третьего), где игроки разделены на две команды - Красную и Синию, воюют друг с другом, выступая за несколько разных классов, каждый из которых имеет уникальные оружие. Сражения происходит в нескольких режимах и на множестве карт, что позволяет добиться огромной реиграбельности. И у каждых игр есть как плюсы и минусы, минусы игры это плохая балансировка команд (Подробно: одна команда может состоять из 5 новичков и 2 обычных игроков, а в другой 6 Old игроков и один новичок.), дальше плохая оптимизация (Подробно: с каждым глобальных обновлений игры, она теряет 10 - 15 Fps из за дополнительного контента и старого движка Valve.). Это все спасибо что прочитали.

90281483.review:
[h2]Here's my review of this decade old game:[/h2]

[b]Pros:[/b]
-Free to play.
-Fun and chaotic gameplay.
-Easy to get into.
-Nine classes to choose.
-Nine gamemodes. [spoiler]11 actually.[/spoiler]
-Hundreds of weapons to choose from.
-Most unlock weapons are balanced.
-Decent numbers of maps.

[b]Cons:[/b]
-F2P players can't communicate and do voice commands in official servers.
-Crafting system is a mess. Not even in alphabetical.
-Training mode needs an update.
-Melee hitreg is a mess.
-Auto-balanced ruins your day.
-Coaching is broken.
-Valve servers doesn't support Replay.
-Graphical issue.

[h1]Mann vs Machine:[/h1]
-Fun and chaotic gameplay.
-Team of six fighting armies of robots in waves.
-Normal robots, Big robots, Boss robots and Tank's to destroy!
-Cool weapons abilities you can upgrade.

Boot Camp mode is free to play = No rewards.
Mann Up mode     is pay to play = Receive rewards.

[h1]Competitive valve match[/h1]
No.


[h2]Is it a fun game? Yeah! It is but.....[/h2]
As of 2021, Servers infested with bots and hackers. VAC do nothing. TF2 Team or Valve do something about it.

La Odisea es un poema épico, que originalmente consta de unos 10.000 versos divididos en 24 cantos.Homero, el rapsoda griego, fue quien recitó las hazañas de un joven ”fecundo en ardides” llamado Odiseo  sintetizando el mundo clásico de los griegos, su mitología y costumbres. El libro narra el regreso de Ulises, el héroe griego (también llamado Odiseo) de la guerra de Troya, teniendo que enfrentar aventuras con deidades y monstruos mitológicos. Durante su ausencia, un grupo de pretendientes de su esposa Penélope está acabando con sus bienes y reino.

Ulises es un hombre joven y fuerte, es el héroe más grande que jamás había existido, tenía un valor indomable, y aunque tuviese miedo enfrentaba lo que se presentara en su viaje a Ítaca. Penélope era la esposa de Ulises y era una mortal, era una mujer muy bella, su vida lejos de su esposo y acosada por los codiciosos pretendientes, era triste, aunque nunca olvidó a Ulises y siempre confió en su regreso. Ella y su hijo, Telémaco, lloraban con frecuencia juntos por Ulises.

Una serie de personajes del mundo mitológico desfilan en estas páginas ya sea como amigos o como los peligros que debe enfrentar Ulises: Circe era una célebre maga, espléndida en belleza, cuya voz de mujer era tan armoniosa que deleitaba y paralizaba a quienes le escuchaban. Al enterarse que a Ulises no le afectaba su magia permitió que él y sus compañeros fuesen sus huéspedes por un año, visitándolos con túnicas muy ricas. Ella, en su extrema sabiduría, dio consejos a Ulises para enfrentar los peligros que encontraría en el regreso a Ítaca.

Poseidón es el dios del mar, llamado Neptuno por los romanos. Era una divinidad vengativa y jamás perdonaba a sus enemigos. Su hijo predilecto llamado Polifemo (un cíclope) fue quien maldijo a Ulises tras perder su ojo a manos del joven y astuto viajero.

Las Sirenas eran seres extraordinarios; eran hermosas mujeres, hijas del mar que, de cintura para abajo, tenían forma de peces. Tenían bellos rostros y las cabelleras flotantes; lo sabían todo. Las sirenas, seres malvados, gustaban de permanecer sentadas sobre la hierba de los prados, a la orilla del mar, entonando bellos cantos. Atraídos por ellas, los marineros, cuyas embarcaciones pasaban por aquellos sitios, no podían resistir a la tentación de desembarcar en la isla y eran asesinados por “las de bello canto”.

Eolo, el dios de los vientos, muy gentil hospedó a Ulises en su hogar durante un mes. En su honor él hizo grandes fiestas y permitió que anclaran ahí sus naves.

Polifemo era un semi dios. Era un horrible gigante muy fuerte, tan espantoso como es difícil imaginar, su estatura era colosal, su corpulencia como la de una mole de piedra y, en medio de la frente, tenía un solo ojo. Era el hijo predilecto de Poseidón, y se ocupaba de guardar sus rebaños y en hacer quesos con la leche que sus cabras le daban. Era caníbal, pues golpeaba las cabezas de los navegantes para después comerlos.

Atenea era la diosa de la sabiduría, llamada Minerva por los romanos. Era una mujer muy bella. Tenía un corazón enorme y se sintió tan conmovida al ver a Ulises día tras día sentado en la orilla del mar mirando las olas, bañado en lágrimas y lanzando tristes lamentos cuando estaba en la isla de Calipso, que decidió socorrerlo. Siendo ella una deidad de alta sabiduría, conocía en lo profundo las muchas penas que en Ítaca afligían a Penélope y a Telémaco a quienes también ayudó.

Hermes era el dios mensajero, también conocido como Mercurio por los romanos “el dios de los pies ligeros” .Tenía unas doradas sandalias aladas que le hacían incansable y que velozmente lo llevaban sobre la tierra y sobre el mar. Ayudó a Ulises en los peligros que tuvo que enfrentar.

La narración abarca los diez años de viajes del astuto Ulises, y los diversos peligros con los que se debió enfrentar. Continúa con la llegada del joven a su isla natal, Ítaca. Allí prueba la lealtad de sus sirvientes, ejerce venganza contra los pretendientes de Penélope, y logra volver a reunirse con su hijo, su esposa y su padre.

La Odisea se transforma finalmente en la metáfora por excelencia del viaje del hombre y los muchos obstáculos que debe sortear en éste, la metáfora del encuentro del hombre con la fortaleza y la fragilidad, con la propia humanidad. Un clásico imperdible.

91259322.review:
Y digo yo...
Que procurare ser breve.
Para los que llevamos años jugando a esté divertidísimo juego (y yo no soy nadie) sabemos que no sólo hemos invertido tiempo; sino mucho más. Y si ahora es cuando he decido atreverme a escribir -Su Reseña- es por una razón sencilla: lo veo necesario y no es precisamente porqué haya conseguido todos sus logros ¡rabia me dá!

1 o A): Una Comunidad y servidores cada vez más y más tóxicos. Sobre todo cuando en una partida online cualquiera escuchas-ves a la gente enfurecida y enrabietada.. como si se les fuera a ir la vida en ello.
Me divierte, sí, pero es algo que te acaba por consumir y después de tanto años, por mucho que quieras, es algo que ya no puedes ignorar pero vamos, ¡será por servidores! ¡Y será por gente...!
 
2 o B): Cada vez más cuentas y perfiles de STEAM de gente usando trucos a diestro y siniestro sin pudor y vergüenza alguna sin que ponga un punto final definitivo, estropeando, a su vez, la experiencia a los nuevos jugadores.

Por un lado pido a los más veteranos una petición que llevo observando desde hace tiempo: ser compasivos con los -free to play-. Recordar, como yo, vuestros comienzos... nadie nace sabiendo y tampoco es cuestión de ensañarse con ellos sólo porqué no sepan jugar o conocer la mecánica del juego por muy sencilla e intuitiva que esté sea, y lo más importante de todo; dejar de hacer bulling online gratuito.
Por el otro lado a los más nuevos e inexpertos les digo he insisto en que no desistan y que se diviertan todo lo que puedan: consiguiendo logros, armas, cosméticos, creando e intercambiando con la Comunidad, ¡echarle ganas y horas!
 
Y ahora la realidad: si a día de hoy todavía Team Fortress 2 se encuentra dentro del TOP 10 de todo el catálogo que nos ofrece STEAM es por una razón tan simple como auténtica.

Siempre, siempre te saca una sonrisa.
Da igual con quien juegues.
Y éso es algo que ningún otro juego le va a poder arrebatar nunca.
Conectaos a un servidor y lo comprobareis. 
Y si de algo me "arrepiento" (entiéndase) del año 2.020 es no poder haber sacado tiempo para jugar... pero el trabajo era el trabajo, ^^.

¿Recomiendo el juego? Al 100%, ¡por supuesto y sin pensarlo dos veces!
Pero con precaución, moderación y sólo invertir si de verdad veis que os gusta.

He dicho.

Team Fortress 2 is one of the games I classify as an "Everybody" game. What I mean by that, is that everybody should be given a chance to play it at least once, whether it be at a friends house, just to try out, or even to play full session.

TF 2 is a free to play multiplayer FPS game. It isn't the stereotypical "shoot everything you see" game though. This game has nine playable classes to choose from. Every one of them has a unique aspect to them. I'm not going to spoil them for you, as a better approach, you should watch the "Meet The Classes" videos to get a better description of them.

Every class also has their individual weaknesses. Whether it be the Sniper and the Spy, or if it would be the medic and the soldier. Though the community isn't really based upon the basics of the game. They're are purchasable items that everybody and you even, will most likely want at some point. The hats. The coats. The accessories that that one person had that you wanted, but he just killed you and went on his way etc.

Resting my case on the items, they're are many styles of gameplay one can take on, making the game have no really OP (Overpowered) people in it. Team Fortress 2 focuses heavily on skill with the individual classes, and while the classes have they're own assortment of community made weapons to choose from, they're is still always something to over-counter it.

Comments:

A classic game, and tons of fun!

Casual mode is a great experience, full of fun maps, gamemodes, and many classes that can be played different ways depending on your playstyle.

However, some of the community is quite toxic. Some players insist on not fighting and just squatting or dancing around the map, calling themselves "friendlies" and getting mad if you kill them. They disadvantage their team by taking up player slots that could be filled with contributing players, and are a general nuisance.

Also, on a particular map, Hightower, players will sometimes tell you not to complete the map objective, desiring instead to run around aimlessly and kill people without end. If you try to complete the objective anyway, you will either receive little help, get cussed at, or kicked from the lobby.

Thankfully, these types of players are the exception, and while they do subtract from the fun, they are not in great enough numbers to ruin it. I've met many nice people playing this game, and made some good friends along the way.

Competitive mode is fun, but sadly unplayable at this point. The ranking system is completely broken, making it impossible to level up without winning an inordinate amount of matches. There are also a unfortunately large amount of cheaters, and unlike in other game modes, players can't be kicked from the lobby. For these reasons few people play this game mode at all. I recommend you stay clear or it.

Man Vs. Machine mode is very fun. It is enjoyable to play and fight waves of invading robots, but can get a little tedious with time if you don't take a break from it after awhile.

Community servers vary, but are often fun for a little while

Here is a checklist of stuff you should try:

-Complete all the achievements (516 of them!)
-Complete all the contracts!
-Get to Level 150, Tier 8 in Casual mode
-Do one Tour of Duty each for all available tours
-Explore all the different community servers.

I hope this review helps! Please upvote it if you found it helpful.

1. Full of cheating bots, have to kick 2-3 every round.

Team balance is terrible, one side is stacked with veteran players with 2000 hours minimum other side is the I downloaded this game 5 minutes ago team, steamroll starts, players start quitting, players from the steamrolling team that get auto-swapped quit instead of sitting around getting wrecked, takes ages for new players to join who will then quit because of the steam roll, so your stuck with a maximum of 5 other players on your team who don't know how to play the game.

3. Valve doesn't care, only a handful of  people still showing team fortress some attention, only new content is cosmetic/taunt dumps for quick cash.

4. Awesome game play and class play style variety, lots of game modes (most are dead though).

5. Weapon nerf's turn weapons other than stock and a handful of others into trash, majority of weapons in the game are meme weapons because for the most part they are awful.

6. A good sniper has no counter except a good sniper, razorback counters spy which is supposed to be snipers counter, zero fun to fight against a skilled sniper instantly killing most of your team over and over.

7. Big skill curve for new players.

8. Love the game hope they either remaster it or pop out a team fortress 3, I doubt they will, team fortress is dying, poor team balance, massive bot problems, lack of new content, bad hitreg, latency issues, interp etc.
 
9. Team fortress 2 came out in 2007, despite the updates you can feel it's age.

10. Ever since casual came out the community aspect has died, yes there are servers but there's bugger all in oceanic and no populated vanilla servers.

11. It'd still be an amazing game if valve bothered to give it the treatment it deserves instead of keeping it alive on life support so they can claim carers support.

12. Also random crits should be changed into random self destruct to demonstrate how much joy and entertainment they contribute to the game, there's nothing quite like saving up an uber or enough charge for a banner buff, spending ages building up a sentry nest or trying to reach the front line as a slow moving heavy only to instantly die because of bad luck.

Yeah, I still love this game but my god it's frustrating.

59936655.review:
Well..

Ok, Ill admit, unlike other high profile folk that have more hours then me.. I have just under 2000 hours but have been playing this game for well over 10 years.. To be exact March 8th 2009. (as my badge says)

I may be a no one in the community, but I have been supporting this game since I first played. The game I would always come back to and call "home".

I, over the years have made friends, enemies, servers.. Learnt different modes, meta, styles, languages.. I have been through multiple events like, The Sniper vs. Spy Update, Classless Update, the big 119th updates update (no joke..) Solider vs Demoman, Scream Fortresses, Christmas updates! You get the point..

There is no sparkle to this game anymore, I cannot jump on a 118 ping New York server, late at night waiting for the Americans to get back online in the evening, me and Banksy taking on 2Fort as Demoman to kill all soliders so that the Demoman could have his own weapon? (Spolier: Solider won, welcome to the Gunboats..) Then finding out TF2 came onto Mac and people that had it, got the ear buds, that sold well.. 

To be fair, I could go on and tell my war stories, but that feeling when the family gets a new puppy and you get shut out as no one is interested in you anymore? This is exactly whats happening with TF2 (dev side).. I always check steam stats and there is always over 50k people playing, always top 10 on the chart but something is missing..

As part of the community, us loyal people that cherish this game, we are the backbone to this beautiful creation. You don't see Blizzard (well not all the time) not maintaining their beautiful creation and of course World of Warcraft is older then this.. Maybe because of the paid subscription, but I am sure that TF2 alone use to get more money as a free to play game at one point. (Jeeze I had to pay for TF2 over 10 years ago..)

I mean ok, fair play, you have a new game coming out.. whooptie doo.. Send all the cavalry towards that.. Yet instead to the people who grew up with TF2, old players and new players. People who have spent hundreds and even thousands of dollars for now a game which to me is dying.. Not the people's fault, but your own selves..
Jumping into a casual game (YOUR servers) to be greeted by not one sniper but three sniper "bots" that have their own way-points, spamming "good shot mate", aim botting, auto spamming chat so no one can see whats written as a wall of blank appears and calling no when someone votes them a ban. When there is 3 or more of them they win the no vote anyway..

When making your own stuff glitch gets patched.. finding glitches in the items_game text file gets patched.. Oh yeah I forgot that's your profits going down the drain.. But don't worry as bots and hackers are not, so were forget about it.. the game.. the people, who truly love and support this game..

Excuse the rant but for a game that still, to me at this dire moment, is still rocking the steam charts, this should be dealt with within a matter of days or weeks.. There are no new updates like the Solider vs Demoman.. The love for this game from you, just has vanished.. 

I will carry on playing as I still love this game and class this as home. But for now, don't expect me to dedicate my time or spend money on anything till this "bot" situation and other stupid stuff is dealt with.. and hopefully soon. With new updates that sparkle in my eyes.. And a new bloody weapon for the Demoman as I deemed the solider win was unfair. 
 
Do I recommend it to others? Oh yes, yes I do. But at the moment with the bot situation, other stupid stuff and the game at the moment being "devless". No.
But still download it, go onto the community servers, find a mode, map, server and enjoy. I will give it a thumbs up but really should be a thumbs down at this point of the games life.

**New Players** the first initiate is daunting, but play for fun, learn who the characters are and the history about them. I did and it got me 2000 hours, 10 years of play and a game I could call home. There are also comics about the game to if you like to read.

Good luck and thank you for the read.

29446619.review:
In a land a long, long time ago, Team Fortress 2 would be a critically acclaimed first person shooter. Boasting its colorful characters against the dreary palette of the Badlands, this game offered to many a wonderful experience. Later updates would add cosmetics, weapons, and a ton of other things to sink your teeth into. Some of those updates are not as well viewed by the community as others, like the addition of crazier and crazier hats. In recent years, the community has felt somewhat negatively towards the team of developers and their updates for this game. Though, there is something important to remember...

We first saw those deranged mercenaries nearly a decade ago! This game has been alive and kicking for a long time, and I doubt that you will soon see a day where these mercs aren't defying laws of physics, common sense, and sometimes all laws in general. You won't find many other games with a soviet in love with a 300 pound minigun that he just lugs around like it's nothing. Nor will you find a quick-witted, caffeine-fueled Bostonian who dances around the battlefield, dodging rockets and bullets like a madman. This game is very outlandish, and incredibly enjoyable. Even after years and years of pushing a payload down a track to blow up the enemies... people want to come back, because although there's some basis and objectives for the game modes, you never play the same game twice. Every match is a total surprise. Even competitively, the 9 classes and variety in what you can play with, it will give you a new experience almost every time you play.

Years of pushing a cart filled to the brim with explosives is a hard task. Thankfully, there are new faces, hats to wear, weapons to try, and a new experience to be had every single day.

12461471.review:
My hours. help.

I wrote something for real!

These hours are legit, I played this game a lot in the past to avoid some tragic stuff in real life. I was young and didn't really have my gaming consoles anymore because of my brothers and I had a really bad pc, which i still own. TF2 was one of the games i could play pretty well on this pc but with horrid graphics, but it was one of the more fun games I installed. I met some real cool and nice people on this game as well as people who i plan to keep by my side. The community back then was more humble compared to nowadays. You have competitive gamers who spam their bind keys with unfunny/gross jokes and very obnoxious people who are either yelling at you or telling you to do specific things to win the game. When really, it doesn't even matter if you win or lose.  However, you also have those people who are really awesome and you may meet some nice friends along the way! Although you never know what kinda person you're going to meet on this game. In my honest opinion, if you want to have a game to just waste time on (and money) or just mess around with people you know (which is what I do now), this is perfect. Esspecially the mann vs. machine co-op. I mainly play that now. Although to me, the game lost its touch, update wise, and I moved onto other games. 

I believe it's worth a shot to try it out but other than that, I'd keep it as a casual game. I don't think the competitive scene is worth getting into anymore because it's being flooded by crude people. Atleast from my experiance after over about 4+ years of playing it just got worse and worse. You will eventually be tied into drama even if you try to avoid it. You'll be more stressed than actually having fun, I'll tell you that!

Although in all seriousness, this game is losing its touch and probably isn't worth making it your main game MAINLY because the updates they've been releasing are becoming very dull and not as great as they used to be. BUT, it's a great game to just play to pass the time and have fun! All you'll really notice nowdays is...people really love to trade more than actually play. Living off as a free to play would be very tough and you'd need to be patient with items you would want, unless you got that MONEY! Hope this helps.


One last thing, I am not saying this game is bad in any way. I am saying that it's worth trying and playing with friends, or even meeting people! Although there are some downsides that you won't like, such as some stuff I pointed out above. Strictly towards the community. I personally think you should have this game as a side game rather than your come home to play sorta thing. Have it as a once in a while game, because it's nothing to be big about, unless you really do not like most of the millions of other games out there. 

Just give it a shot and see what you think! Have fun <3

61473072.review:
Can't believe I've never made a review for this game before...
I've been playing TF2 since 2012, and followed the content since 2009. It's fascinated me for over a decade.
When I first started playing, the learning curve was almost unnoticable. I had fun from the start, playing Heavy after 3 years of longing to :) I've played it almost consistently since them, and I find a new way to enjoy playing when I get sick of a certain way.

2012: Dicking around, learning the game
2013: Discovering community servers
2014: MvM. A LOT of MvM
2015: Dipping into competitive play and aim practice
2016: Not much gameplay, but so much effort into SFM and stuff
2017: Casual Pubs
2018/2019: Almost entirely Degroot Keep

I'll be sitting in a chair at age 80, and my grandkid will ask me about this game in my Library. At that point, I can see myself giving a warm smile and telling him all the stories of pub-stomping and rocket-jumping and friendly hoovies during the golden age of gaming.

10/10. I love this game with all my heart

28443246.review:
İlk önce oyundan bir bahsedeyim.Oyunda tam 9 karakterimiz var.

1-Scout: Scout oyunun en çevik karakteridir. İki kez sıçrayabilme özelliği vardır. Birincil silahı alternatif tüfeklerden oluşur. Bu tüfekler düşük atış hızına sahip olsalar bile hasarları bir o kadar fazladır. 2 katı daha hızlı kontrol noktası ele geçirme özelliği sayesinde oyunun en kilit karakteridir.
2-Soldier: Soldier karakterimiz roketatar kullanan bir karakterdir. Oyun içerisinde envai çeşit roketatar bulunmaktadır(Tabi bunlara girmeyeceğim). Roketatar alan hasarı veren bir silahtır. Oyundaki bazı özel güçlendiricler ile tek bir roket ile karşı takımın kabusu olabilirsiniz. Ayrıca bu roketatarlar ile rocketjump(roket sıçrayışı) denilen hareketlerde uzmanlaşırsanız oyun içerisinde ön saflara daha hızlı ulaşabilirsiniz.

3-Pyro: Pyro karakterimiz alev silahı kullanan bir karakterimizdir. Dış görünüşü ilginçte olsa içi melek gibi bir karakterdir. Alev silahı adı üzerinde alev püskürtür. Bu alevler anlık hasar verir ve eğer alevleriniz maruz kaldıktan sonra kaçan düşmanlar varsa onlarda belli bir süre içerisinde hasar almaya devam edeceklerdir. Ayrıca alev silahının bir diğer özelliği ise püskürtme özelliğidir(Farenizin sağ tuşu). Bu özellik ile gelen roketler bombaları hatta oyuncuları püskürterek takım arkadaşlarınızı gelecek hasarlardan kurtarabilirsiniz.

4-Demoman: Demoman karaktermizin iki özel silahı vardır. Bir bomba atar bir diğeri ise yapışkan bomba atar. Normal bomba atar herhangi bir oyuncu ya da yapı ile etkileşime girdiğinde doğrudan patlar ya da duvarlara çarptırılarak kör noktalara ulaştırılabilir. Yapışkan bomba atar ise belli bir sayıda attığınız(max : 8 bazı özel silahlar ile 14) bombaları aynı anda patlatabilirsiniz. Aynı soldier karakterinde olduğu gibi stickjump(yapışkan bombalar ile yapılan sıçramalar) ile ön saflara daha hızlı ulaşabilirsiniz.

5-Heavy: Heavy karakterimiz oyunun en ağır aynı zamanda en fazla sağlığa sahip karakteridir. Oyunda tank görevi için en ideallerindendir. Minigun silahına sahiptir. Arkadanızda sağlam bir medic oyuncusu olduğu sürece durdurulamaz bir güç olmanıza engel yoktur. 

6-Engineer: Oyundaki engineer itemleri  3 levela kadar gelebiliyor. Engineerların aletleri yaparken metala ihtiyacı olur  bu metalde ya mermi kutularıyla ya da yerdeki silahları alarak toplanır.Eğer taretin görmediiği bir menzilden ateş görüyorsa gidip o adamı öldürmelisiniz yoksa sentryniz yıkılır.Sentrynin canı azalmaya başladığında ingiliz anahtarıyla vurarak canını düzeltebilirsniz.Yaptığınız makinelerinn yapım süresini kısaltmak için ingiliz anahtarıyla vurun daha çabuk üretilir.Ve makineleri geliştirmek için de ingiliz anahtarı kullanılır,vurdukca seviyesi artmaya başlar.ispanser , Hem can almaya hem de mermi doldurmaya yarar.Teleporter,2 tane teleporter buildi vardır biri giriş biri çıkış.Giriş ve çıkışı kurduğunuz zaman oyuncular giriş teleporterın üzerine geldiklerinde çıkış teleporterı nerede ise oraya doğru ışınlanırlar.Teleporter yavaş karakterleri ön saflara getirmekte en etkili builddir.

7-Medic: Medic oyunun en önemli support(destek) karakterlerinin başında gelir. Ön saflarda savaşan takım arkadaşlarınıza ekstra can sağlar ya da canı az olan takım arkadaşlarınızın canlarını yenilersiniz. Eğer medicte yeteri kadar uzmanlaşırsanız medici bir saldırı karakteri gibi oynamanız bile mümkündür.

8-Sniper: Keskin nişancıdır.Keskin nişancı tüfeği kafadan kritik vurur.Ve bu tüfeğin dürbününü açtığınızda şarj olma özelliği vardır. Bu şarjı arkasında medic olan heavylere tek atmak için kullanın.Yakın mesafede kötü fakat uzak mesafelerin ustasıdır.

9-Spy: En sevdiğim karaktere geldik spy. Spy görünmez olan bir karakterimizdir. Bir altıpatları, elektro bozucusu, bıçağı ve görünmezlik saati bulunur. Düşman oyuncusunun arkasında geldiğinizde elinizde bıçak varsa spy bıçağı havaya doğru kaldırır. Spy bıçağı havaya kaldırdığı sırada düşmana saldırırsanız düşman oyuncu direkt ölecektir. Çünkü bıçak o şekilde her türlü karaktere tek atar. Ama sniperların arkasında jiletsırt(Kalkan) varken saldırırsanız kalkanı kıracaktır ve 2 3 saniye boyunca bıçakla tekrar saldırı yapamayacaksınız. Ayrıca o kalkanı kırdığınızda bir tür ses çıkacaktır ve bu sesi sniper duyarsa hemen sizi aramaya koyulacaktır yani dikkatli olun ve überli düşmanlarada bıçak işlemez.O düşmanı öldürmek için überinin bitmesini bekleyin. Elektro bozucu engineerın buildlerini bozar. Ama dikkatli olun ve kendinizi belli etmeden bu aletleri bozmaya çalışın.Ama eliniz hızlıysa ilk önce engineerı arkasından bıçaklayıp çok hızlı bir şekilde aletlerini bozabilirsiniz. Ve görünmezlik saati spyı görünmez yapar zaten spyın en başında görünmez olabilen bir karakter demiştim. İşte bu görünmezlik saati ile görünmez olunabiliyor. Fakat bu görünmezlik saatinin bir süresi var. Ayrıca görünmezken pyro sizi yakarsa görünüz olursunuz ya da sniper sizi kavatelerse(Binevi spy açığa çıkarma aleti pek ayrıntıya inmeyeceğim)görünürsünüz bu yüzden bu saati kullanırken dikkatli olun.

Evet şimdi gelelim oyunun içine. Oyunda hiç hile sıkıntısı yok. Çok nadir hile kullanan çıkıyor.(Lütfen sizlerde hile kullanmayın.)Oyunda kozmetik(Kostüm)eşyalar ve alay hareketleri var ve bu tür eşyaları takas edebilirsiniz.

Bu oyunu oynarken yanınızda arkadaşınız varsa daha eğlenebilirisiniz.

Benim için pek bir kötü yok yani kötü yönde açıklayamayacağım.

Buraya kadar okuduysanız çok teşekkür ederim.Umarım yardımcı olabilmişimdir.Hayatınızın iyi geçmesi dileğiyle.

8849100.review:
▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▒░  8,5/10

Voila des années que je joue a Team Fortress 2 (depuis Novembre 2007 d'après ma médaille Vétéran Grisonnant) et j'y joue encore très régulièrement.


Il y a eu des hauts et des bas au fil des mises à jour. Team Fortress 2 n'est plus le même depuis l'intégration de l'inventaire et des items et surtout depuis qu'il est devenu [b]Free To Play[/b]. (et dire que les consoleux n'ont pas subits ces mises à jours, parfois je les envies. Et oui, il y a eu une version PS3 et XBOX 360 de Team Fortress 2)

Imaginez Team Fortress 2 en 2007. Tous les Soldiers avaient une [b]simple lance-roquette[/b] avec [b]un fusil à pompe[/b] et [b]une pelle[/b].

Maintenant, un Soldiers peut s’équiper de [b]lance roquette électrique[/b], d'un [b]porte-étendard[/b] qui buff les dégâts  et d'une [b]poêle[/b] bruyant. Et il y a d'autres combinaisons possibles!
(voila une image qui démontre l'exemple: http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/197/037/35i5fg2.jpg )

C'était un bouleversement total pour Team Fortress 2. On pouvait se retrouver avec de [b]centaines d'armes[/b] différentes avec différents propriétés. Collectionner des [b]chapeaux ridicules[/b] et différents cosmétiques pour [b]habiller différemment sa classe[/b], tout n'était plus pareille.



Mais au finale, je me dis que si Team Fortress 2 n'avais pas subit tous ces changements, le jeu n'aurais plus autant de joueurs, déserté de tous les serveur et retrouver que quelques serveurs à 4/10 joueurs, un peu comme Brink. Et pour finir je me suis adapté à ce "nouveau Team Fortress 2"

Team Fortress 2 reste quand même un FPS unique avec 9 classes avec des objectifs d'attaque/défense précises, dont chaque classe à [b]son propre rôle[/b], [b]son propre gameplay[/b], ou on peut tester de [b]différents techniques et stratégies[/b]. Ces 9 classes restent toutefois très accessible aux débutants.

Il propose tout de même quelques mises à jour sympa qui rajoute des [b]modes de jeu supplémentaires[/b], ou même encore le fameux mode [b]co-op[/b] ou on doit affronter un horde de robots.

Le Source Engine à montré encore une fois ses grandes qualités avec les animations impeccable et les expressions faciales des personnages géré dans un jeu multi-joueur, une chose très peu commune dans les jeux multi d'aujourd'hui.

Et l'une des grandes qualités qui fait la force de Team Fortress 2, c'est sa communauté qui créent des maps et même des [b]modes de jeu customisé[/b].


Si vous n'avez pas encore testé Team Fortress 2, je vous conseille de faire un petit tour maintenant qu'il est Free To Play. Vous risquez de ne plus le lâcher de si tôt comme moi.

Ребята, 2300 с лишним часов. Не буду увиливать-я ветеран этой игры. С 2014 года-я в игре. Десятки карт, интересные персонажи, большое количество оружия и связанных с ним тактик для каждого класса-а самое главное, командная работа.
Это первый мой онлайн-шутер.
И я был бы просто счастлив написать положительный обзор и идти играть дальше....
Но не могу.
Я устал. Устал от засилья ботов и бездействия Valve по этому поводу. Боты и игре с 2016 года! Но тогда это были лишь единичные случаи, которые быстро вскрывались, а бота кикали. Потом кризис 2018 года, когда сервера ложились под волнами атак ботов пачками. 
После этого-каждый год эти запрограмированные болванчики возвращались-и сливали Team Fortress 2, этот шедевр, в ничто. И с каждым годом ботов становилось все больше, они становились хитрее и опаснее, а умники из  Valve тратили все меньше сил на их устранение.
Мы ждали, мы надеялись, что будет новый апдейт, что ботоводов засудят или просто заблочат к чертовой матери. Мы ждали Возрождения. Но этого так и не случилось. Лишь бесконечные идиотские кейсы забивают инвентарь игроков.
После Jungle Inferno игру бросили. Я не хочу в это верить-но, видимо, это так.
Сейчас нет возможности играть в "Командную Крепость". 2021 год. Хочется назвать это войной машин.
Боты оккупировали чуть ли не каждый сервер, даже на Creators.TF сейчас бегают стайки снайперов-аимботеров. Заместо вышедших с серверов людей-заходят боты. Снайпер отныне-первоочередная цель для кика своей собственной командой. 
А у меня вопрос-Valve,  вы кто?
Вы богатая компания, содержащая мощнейшую игровую платформу для ПК, живая икона геймеров и создатели игр-шедевров на века....Или крохотная инди-студия, неспособная защитить свое собственное детище от нападок всяких фриков?
Или вам просто...плевать? 100000 игроков в Team Fortress 2, как мне кажется, хотели бы услышать ответ...

13329199.review:
게임성을 따지자면 단연 최고 수준의 팀포트리스2.
그러나 한국에서 제대로 팀포트리스2의 진정한 재미를 느끼고 싶다면 적당히만 하는 것이 좋을 듯 하다

무엇보다 클래스들의 개성대로 적을 제거하고 승리하는 목적에서 벗어난 한국에 있는 수많은 서버가 있다.
대표적으로 팀포트리스2의 순수한 재미를 느끼는 유저들 보다는 장사를 해서 돈으로만 먹고사는 유저가 정말 많으며, 맵도 훤히 개방되어 있고, 변수조차도 없는 오렌지맵투성이에다가, 적당한 한도 내에서 그치지 않고, 과할 정도로 많은 모드 (놀기, 해일서버 등) 가 정말 많다. 하지만 여기까지는 이해할 수 있다. 어드민들이 자기가 원하는 서버 열겠다는데 뭐 어쩌겠는가? 

진정한 한국 내 팀포트리스2의 문제는 여기서부터 시작된다.

친목 행위가 정말로 심하다. 진짜로. 아니 진짜 장난이 아니라, 정말 민망할 정도로 친목이 성행한다.
아무 서버나 들어가서 60분 이내로 플레이해도 친목을 하는 유저들이 정말로 많이 보인다.
대표적인 원인은 무엇보다 어드민들의 네임드화이다.
과장이 아니라 친목이 심하다고 느껴지는 서버가 정말 팀포트리스2 한국 서버 내에서도 손에 다 꼽을 수 없다. 
적당한 친목은 문제가 없다.
A씨, 거점 점령하러 가주세요 같은 거라던가.
하지만 이러한 친목이 과하면 이른바 좆끼리 하는 친목인 좆목이 된다. 

일단 채팅창에서 어드민이 특성 유저하고 낄낄대며 좆목을 하고 있다? 
그렇게 되면, 이 서버에 자주 오지만 어드민과 안면이 없는 유저는 당연히 어드민과 친해지고 싶어하며 그 어드민에게 자신을 적극 어필하게 된다. 
그러면 그 어드민을 그 유저를 유독 챙겨주게 된다. 당연히 그렇게 그들만의 채팅방이 만들어지고, 그들만의 그룹이 만들어지고 그들만의 세상 및 그들만의 서버가 된다. 
그리고 새로온 유저를 배척하고 당연히 의견을 무시하게 된다. 그러면 또 이어지는 어드민에게 자기어필. 무한반복.
게다가 여기에 오타쿠들이 자신만의 주제로만 서버 채팅 주제를 이끌어 나가는 걸 보면 굉장히 짜증난다.
이런 주제에 상반되는 질문을 했을 시 배척된다.

지금 당장 좆목 서버 아무거나 하나 들어간 뒤, 
"무기 A와 무기 B중 어느 것이 공방에서 효율이 좋을까요?" 와
"애니 추천좀" 을 해봐라.
전자의 경우엔 다들 무시하는 경우가 태반인 반면, 후자는 앞다투어 대답을 해주는 경우가 상당하다.

마지막으로, 서버관리가 거의 개판이다. 서버관리가 잘 되는 서버도 몇몇 보이지만 그렇지 않은 것도 보인다. 

친목하는 어드민. 말이 필요없다. 특히 좆목의 중심에 있는 사람이 규칙을 어길시, 처벌도 안한다.

이리저리 궂은 핑계대며 놀기만 하는 어드민 : 이 놈들은 서버 규칙 어기는 놈들이 있는데도 불구하고, 노는 것에만 정신이 팔려 서버관리를 개판으로 한다. 신고를 해도 받아주지 않는 경우가 상당하며, 자기 좆대로 판단 하에 영밴을 때리는 경우도 있다. 

관종어드민 : 거래서버나 노는 서버에 심각하게 많이 보인다. 
대표적으로 이벤트를 한다며 아무런 보상없이 자기의 무료함만을 달래 줄 만한 이벤트를 개최한다며 좆목을 하거나, 어드민 채팅 명령어인 @@@ 을 남발해 잡채팅도 서버채팅으로 출력되게끔 게임화면 중앙에 띄워 관심을 받으려는 놈들 등 존나 많다.

MOTD 읽고오세요 : 이 말은 맞다. 서버규칙은 반드시 읽어야한다. 하지만 정작 MOTD 읽고오세요를 듣고 정작 MOTD를 보면 규칙은 없고 빈 화면이나 별 병신같은 일본 애니캐릭터가 있다. 네이버 카페인 경우도 부지기수 하며, MOTDgd라면 기다리기도 짜증난다.
만약 좆목서버, 노는서버, MOTD에 애니캐릭터, 좆목어드민, 관종어드민등이 합쳐진 서버가 존재한다면 차단해라. 

한국 팀포트리스2를 제대로 하려면 일단 좆목부터 척살하자. 병신같은 어드민 전부 물갈이 시키는 것도 좋으며, 옛 시절 좆목의 반열에 있었던 유저는 반성하자.

64013079.review:
It survived 12 full years, is on its 13th year, you can still reliably play on dedicated servers from both Valve and the community. There is still a competitive scene, while not huge, it's active enough to where you can find a team and play at most skill levels. For a game to survive that long, there should be some form of optimism towards it. 

While I don't agree with a lot of decisions made by the devs and the community, what's important is that the game continues to live which is more than a lot of games from its time can say.

[h1]Team Fortress 2[/h1]

-Team Fortress  FPS/Aksiyon/Çok Oyunculu Ve Oynaması Ücretsiz Bir Oyundur.Bu Oyunda 2 Takım , 9 Sınıf , 7 Oyun Türü (+3 Beta Oyun Türü) Bulunmaktadır.

-Takım Red(Kırmızı) ve Blue(Mavi) Dan Oluşmaktadır.
Oyundaki Sınıflara Gelecek Olursak

[b]Scout[/b]= Oyundaki En Hızlı Karakter , Düşmanın Arasına Hızlıca Girip Amansız Saldırılar Yapabileceğiniz Bir Sınıf.

[b]Soldier[/b]= Benim Deyimim İle RoketAdam , Bu Sınıf Gerçekten Oynayabilenler İçin Oyunu Mükemmel Hale Getiren Bir Sınıf Oyunu Tek Başınıza Taşıyabilme Özelliği Sağlayabiliyor!!!.Ama Doğru Söylemek Gerekirse Benim Pek Oynayamadığım Bir Sınıf :(

[b]Pyro[/b]= Oyunda Sevdiğim 2. Sınıftır.Güzel Ataklar Yapmak İçin İdeal Bir Sınıftır.Aranıza Birde Medic Aldınızmı Sırtınız Yere Gelmez :).Oyunda Noobların (Acemilerin) Oynadığı Diye Bilinen Bir Sınıf Olduğu Sanılır Ama Bence Asıl Öyle Düşünenler Noobdur ;)

[b]Demoman[/b]=Bence Demoman'ı Açıklamak İçin Şu Yeterli Olacaktır.Savunan (Yada Saldıran) Takımdaysanız Savunduğunuz (Yada Saldırdığınız) Yere Yapışkan Bombaları Yerleştirerek (Sol Tuş İle) Ve Düşman Geldiğinde Patlarak (Sağ Tuş İle) Seri Katliamlar Yapabilirsiniz.

[b]Heavy[/b]= Ağır Silah Kullanan Ve Oldukçada Yavaş Hareket Eden Bir Sınıftır.Tek Başına Bence Fazla Etkili Değildir.Fakat Takımında Medic Var İse Onunla Beraber İlerleyerek Kolayca Karşı Takımı Temizleyebilir.

[b]Engineer[/b]= Bana Göre Oyundaki Değerinin Bilinmesi Gereken Sınıflardan Biri Neden Diyecek Olursanız.Yaptığı İşler Gerçektende Takımın İlerlemesini Kolaylaştıracak Hareketlerdir.Işınlayıcı (Giriş - Çıkış ) Kurarak Takıma Büyük Bir Avantaj Sağlar Ki Demek İstediğimi Eğer Takımınızda Engineer Olmazsa Anlarsınız , Kurduğu Işınlayıcılar Sayesinde Savunulacak( Yada Ele Geçirilecek) Bölgeye Işınlanmanızı Sağlar Bu Da Zaman Kaybınızı Azaltır.

Dispenser:3.Seviyeye Kadar Geliştirilebilir.Takımınıza Büyük Yardımınızın Dokunduğu Diğer Bir Araç.Takım Arkadaşlarınızın Canını Doldurabilir Ve Mermi Desteği Sağlar.

Işınlayıcı Giriş):3.Seviyeye Kadar Geliştirilebilir. Işınlanacağınız Yerin Başlangıç Yerine Koyulur.Genellikle Burası Base Olur.

Işınlayıcı(Çıkış):3.Seviyeye Kadar Geliştirilebilir.Işınlanılacak Yere Koyulur.Genellikle Savunulacak (Yada Saldırılacak) Yere Yakın Düşmanlar Tarafından Görülmeyecek Bir Yer Seçilir.

[b]Medic[/b]= Oyunda Fazla Rastlanmayan Bir Sınıf (Benim Genel Olarak Oyunlarda Görmediğim Bir Sınıf).Oyunda Değeri Bilinmesi Gereken Diğer Bir Sınıfta Medictir.Medic İsmindende Anlaşılacağı Üzere Takımınızın En Büyük Yardımcısı Sizi Ayakta Tutabilecek Sınıflardan Başta Gelecek İsimlerdendir.

[b]Sniper[/b]=Uzun Menzile Sahiptir Takım Arkadaşlarınıza Çok Büyük Destekte Bulunabilirsiniz!!!.Fakat Dikkat Edin Arkanızda Bir Spy Olabilir.İşte Tam Bu Arada Devreye JiletSırt İtemi Devreye Giriyor.BU İtem Sayesinde Arkadan Bıçaklanmayı Bir Kereliğine (Yani Her Öldüğünüzde O İtem Yenileniyor Bir Kere Kullanılıyor Sanmayın) Engelleyebilirsiniz.JiletSırtın Kırıldığını Duyduğunuz An Direk Arkanızı Tarayın Gitsin Yada Kaçın :).Diğer Bir İtemide Anlatacak Olursak İsmi Kavate Bunun Sayesinde Görünmez Bir Şeyi Gösterebilirsiniz.Sanıyorsunuzki Şurada Spy Var At Oraya Varmı Yokmu Öğren :).Yada Takım Arkadaşın Yanıyor Veyahutta Sen Üzerine Yat Yangını Söndür.

[b]Spy=[/b]Oyundaki Oynanışı En Zevkli Olan Düşmanınızın Size Gerçekten Düşman Olmanızı Sağlayacak Bir Sınıftır.Engineer'ın Araçlarını Bozarak Düşmanı Hayal Kırıklığına Uğratıp Takımının İlerlemesini Kolaylaştırabilirsin.Bu Sınıf İle Düşmanın Arasına Kolayca Karışabilirsiniz.Hatta Onlardan Biri Bile Olabilirsiniz.Tek Yapmanız Gereken Kılık Değiştirmek.Ama Dikkat Edin Biri Sizi Anladığınızda İşiniz Zor Olabilir :).Görünmez Olarak (Sağ Tuş İle) Düşmana Ağır Kombolar Yapıp Yavaşlatabileceğiniz Bir Özelliğe Sahiptir Spy.Bence Oyundaki En Eğlenceli Sınıfta Spydır.

-Oyun Türlerine Gelecek Olursak Sizi Sıkmadan Kısa Kısa Açıklayayım.

[b]Özel Teslimat[/b]=Çantayı Taşıyıp Onu Teslim Edilmesi Gereken Yere Götüren Takım Kazanır.

[b]Yük Vagonu(Beta)[/b]=Vagonu İlerlet Ve Oyunu Kazan :)

[b]Robotları Yok Etme(Beta)[/b]= Amaç Karşı Takımın Robotlarını Yok Ederek Ve İstihbaratını Ele Geçirerek Puan Kazanmaktır.

Vaktinizi Ayırıp Okuduğunuz İçin Teşekkürler.Oyunun Türkçe Dil Desteği Mevcuttur.Serverlar Vac Korumalıdır.Oyun Sürekli Güncelleniyor.İyi Oyunlar...

27181615.review:
I've been playing Team fortress 2 Since the good ol' days before it became free to play, (I started back in 2nd february, 2010). Team fortress 2 has since then managed to come a long way while still holding the title as best free to play game.
Why would i recommend this game to anyone?, Well, I really don't know where to begin.

I've been spending alot of my life playing Team fotress 2, apparently over 4000 hours on it.
Ever since i got the game, i've been making tons of new friends from the casual servers as well as some of them friendly community servers. I tend to group up with my friends alot and have some fun within the casual and community servers.
The graphics of the game are simple, yet unique at the same time.
Team Fortress 2 has an OST made by a wide arrange of people.
Team fortress 2 also has a giant range of mods for people who like to try out a different experience in their games as well as the steam workshop support which allows the great big community of Team fortress 2 to also submit their creativity towards the game, Whether it comes in an Weapon, a hat, a Taunt, unusual effects or even maps as well. It's amazing to see the wonderful ideas that the community comes up with.
The Team fortress 2 community have designed multiple maps already with unique gamemodes which might give interests to the player if they'd like to try something out of the ordinary instead of just fighting.

When it comes to classes in the game, Valve had made 9 classes which all give the players a different playstyle that suits them as well as an unplayable 10th character known as the civillian.
You could be the scout, Fast and quite a big damage dealer for those with a good aim.
Could be a soldier, knowing how to rocket jump to get to the frontlines quick and fast. (i recommend all new solly mains to learn and practice this as it is really useful)
There is the pyro, a class which some hate but it also has some great uses such as keeping the spies away, can carry different weapons as well which can suit a players playstyle, whether they'd like to play Defensive, Offensive or even try to flank an enemy to kill them whilst they're not looking.
There is the Demoman, a class that is a great damage dealer and can also do his own explosive jumping using his sticky bombs.
There is the heavy, a class which owns up to its name, Moves slower than all the classes but makes up for this with its large amount of health, Can swap out its shotgun for something to heal it too.
The engineer, a class who builds buildings to support his team and also great on the defensive side too, placing sentries in key areas so the enemies cannot push through.
The medic, a class which isn't that common for people to main, Medic's can heal player to build something called an ubercharge, Once at 100%, This uber can be used many different ways depending on the mediguns, from invincibility to high damage dealing to just rapid healing instead.
The sniper, This class is a long range damage dealer, one that is deadly in the hands of a good aim as well as a well-timed headshot can kill any class if they've gone scoped long enough.
The spy, (Personally, this is the class i main), The spy is a jack of all trades class, He can go on the offensive, Defensive or Supportive, He is able to instant kill key targets with his butterfly knife with a successful backstab (Also known as a Balisong knife), This could take out medics, Snipers or just the annoying classes, He can use his sapper to sap engineer buildings which will then become disabled until they're either destroyed or the sapper itself is destroyed on the building.
Spies can also go on the defensive too, being able to backstab any progressing targets, whether its a heavy or pyro or medic, the spy always has you covered.
Don't want to fight others?, Well we still got you covered.
Team fortress 2 also has a gamemode known as Mann Vs Machine, ( a.k.a MvM for short), Which users can team up in groups of 6 (Or 10 on some community groups)
MvM has 2 versions of it, Mann Up and Boot Camp. Mann Up is for the people who like to pay to play for a chance at winning items whilst Boot Camp is like a practice Variant version, You can test out what Mann up would be like and what it is you'd have to face upon going into mann up.
Mann Up can earn the players unique rewards based upon the tour the player is doing.

Reasons i still play TF2 as of today:
+There is alot of people who test your skills in a fight, Only through fighting better opponents will your skill grow.
+Valve has managed to launch an VAC Wave, Killed off any aimbotters/Hackers who made the game unfair for others.
+Being able to play in the wide variety of custom gamemodes people have designed for it.
+Making new friends which i probably have too many right now x3
+Always meeting new foes, making new Rivals who i call a great friend too.
+You can always challenge yourself to do better in certain areas, Like rocket jumping, Trickstabbing as a spy, etc.
+Valve can almost patch any bug within days of it being found, certain bugs being fixed within an hour or 2 too!
+There are many communities based around TF2 which are friendly.
Reasons i might uninstall TF2?
-Can't think of any
-Very rarely finding a hacker or 2 on Thundermountain, but thats honestly about it.
But yes, Thats all i can think about to write within this Review. I'd always rate this game up.

You will love this first-person shooter (FPS). You will hate it. You will find this to be the best *and* worst thing ever. You'll laugh, cry, rage, question, and meme-ify this game from start to finish. Play for free. Trade for weapons. Pay for cosmetics (if you're rich as anything). Be part of the randomness, the insanity, and the hilarity that is TF2.

写这篇测评的时候，时间仿佛回到了小学3年级......
那时我第一次接触V社的游戏是半条命2，然后的几年我就开始接触V社的其他游戏，cs，dod，求生之路，传送门，但我最喜欢的仍然是军团要塞2——精美的画面，多职业的选择，碎尸的快感......只可惜那是我的电脑玩不起tf2，只能羡慕那些游戏视频，对着那些frag视频目瞪口呆.
“军团要塞2免费了！”听到这消息是我已经上初中了。很高兴那是我的新电脑终于能成功驾驭tf2了。从此，我开始了我的steam之旅。
转眼已过去2年多了，也就是我现在写这篇测评的时候。我难以想象这段时间里steam所给予我的：从tf2转正开始，从第一次买正版开始，如果没有steam，我真的可能体验不到tf2，劳拉9电影般的游戏体验，光头5潜入时的刺激，年货突突突的爽快，无限的剧情，还有各种各样的独立游戏......最重要的还是我在steam上认识了许多新朋友XD，我很享受steam好友们一起联机的时光，这些都是以前除了csol就是盗版求生之路2的经历所不能给予的。
好吧，上面我扯了怎么多我就想表达一句话：如果一个游戏优秀到足以让一个人拉入steam坑，那么这游戏的优秀性我还用说吗？

학생때부터 시작하여 어느덧 대한민국의 국방의 의무를 다하고 온 지금 

기존에 알던 유저들은 속속 떠나거나

나와 같이 국방의 의무를 하러 가신분들이 너무 많다

과도한 친목질로 인하여 사람들은 점점 떠나는거같다

사기꾼도 조심좀 했으면 좋겠다 애네들은 사기를 단 한번으로 끝내지 않는다 절대로

본인은 이게임에 정말 애정이 정말 많고 이 게임으로 인하여

대부분의 스팀친구들을 만들었다고 해도 무방하다

또한 지금 이 시간에도 정말 재미있게 즐기고 있다

엣날부터 하아 시부랄 ㅈ망겜 ㅈ망겜 그랬는데 이제는 진짜로 게임이 망한것같다

새벽에 팀포를 켜도 북적거리던 시절이 있었는데 ..

이제는 정말로 찾기가 힘들거나 0명인 서버들만 가득하다

솔직히 이 게임 정말 재밌다 , 오래해서 정말 정이 많이 든거같다

천시간 단위 유저분들은 공감할것이다

정말 내가 이게임을 안하게 되는 순간이 온다면 나는 무슨 게임을 하고있을까 

스팀엔 수많은 게임이 존재하고 자신의 취향에 맞는 게임들을 찾아서 할수있다

본인은 FPS 류를 정말 좋아한다 TPS도 좋아하는 편이다 EX: 배틀그라운드 

오버워치 아바 스페셜포스 서든어택 카스 솔져오브포츈 워페이스 블랙스쿼드 어나더데이

여튼 내로라하는 국내 온라인 FPS 게임들 , 비주류 FPS들도 거의 다 해본편이다 

쓰기 귀찮아서 덜 쓴것도 많지만

하지만 이 게임에는 다른게임과 차별성이 확실히 많아서 더 개성있고 재밌게 플레이했던거같다

한때는 해킹을 당하기도 했고 상실감에 빠져 한때 잠깐 접는듯했으나 다시 이 게임을 시작했던것은

다른 어떤 게임을 해보아도 이만한 게임이 없다는것을 너무도 잘알고있었기에 다시 했던거같다

이 게임으로 인하여 좋은분들도 너무 많이 만났고 , 나의 이기심으로 인하여 소중한 친구도 잃었다

정말 꾸준히 플레이했던것 같다 개인적으로 나는 유입들이 더 많이 들어와줬으면 하는 바램이다

게임? 어렵지않다 하다보면 어느새 즐기고 있는 자신을 보게 될것이다

지금은 한때 같이 플레이하고 같이 즐기던 분들이 하나하나 떠나는것을 정말 마음이 착잡하다

나에겐 팀포하는 사람들이 1명이라도 소중하다

괜히 사람도 없어져 가는 게임에서 서로 헐뜯고 비방하고 배척하는 행동은 안해줬으면 좋겠다

본인이 그랬다면 반성하고 그러지말자 

혹시라도 주변에 이 게임을 시작한지 얼마 안됬거나 팀포 어린이라면 이것저것 설명도 해주고

자신이 여유가 있다면 모자 몇개라도 씌어주자 모자 받고 좋아하는 꼬맹이 모습을 보면은

급 빵-끗 하고 있는 자신을 보게 될것이다 개구리 올챙이적 시절 잊지말고 

조금 못하거나 답답한 모습이 보이더라도 겜매너를 즐기면서

인게임에선 바르고 고운말만 쓰며 모두 다같이 즐기는 팀포인이 됬으면 좋겠다 ^0^

7752067.review:
Team Fortress 2. Hut-Simulator. Ego-shooter.

Mit Team Fortress 2 serviert Valve einen kostenlosen Ego-Shooter, der sich selbst nicht ernst nimmt.
Das Prinzip ist einfach: Zwei Teams ('Blu' und 'Red') bekriegen sich aufgrund familiärer Umstände vergangener Generationen so lange, bis einer weint. Dem Spieler werden hier 9 Klassen geboten, um seinem Team konstruktiv zu helfen.

Scout:
Flink, agil und Meister im Baseball. Nicht zuletzt wegen seinen provokanten Sprüchen ist er so manchen ein Dorn im Auge...

Soldier:
Er ist die Disziplin in Person. Mit Raketenwerfer, Schrotflinte und Klappschaufel hält er in der Front die Stellung und verschafft sich mit sog. 'Rocket-jumps' taktische Vorteile.

Pyro:
Der Psycho. Man weiß nie so recht, was er gerade denkt und was er gleich anstellen wird... Aber es ist gut, wenn er auf der eigenen Seite kämpft und den Gegner knusprig süß-sauer zubereitet.

Demoman:
"Äuueeeiioooaaa...hüüeeoo... [Rülps]" - "Ich glaube wir haben ein Problem.". Vielleicht ist es der Alkohol, der den Demoman zum Meister der Pyrotechnik macht.

Heavy:
Russischer Abstammung, nicht ganz klug und etwas langsam. Dafür hat er eine Waffe. Eine mächtige Waffe. Seine Minigun baut an der Defensive die eiserne Mauer neu auf.

Engineer:
"Trust me, I'm an engineer!". Der Tüftler verschafft dem Team mit seinen Selbstschussanlagen, Gesundheits-/Munitionsstationen und Teleportationsgeräten enorme Vorteile und ist bei jedem seiner Teamkollegen gern gesehen.

Medic:
Wenn die Situation auf dem Schlachtfeld hoffnungslos erscheint ist der Medic die Lösung. Er heilt die Kameraden im Gefecht und kann einem Mitspieler für kurze Zeit Unverwundbarkeit geben.

Sniper:
Eiskalt aus der Ferne. Ohne mit der Wimper zu zucken zieht er am Abzug und schaltet die Feinde nach und nach aus. Nicht nur wegen seinen coolen Sprüchen ist er einer der beliebtesten Klassen.

Spy:
Er ist anders. Er agiert aus dem Hinterhalt. Der Spy ist der Meister der Tarnung und kann sich entweder unsichtbar machen oder als Feind verkleiden, um den Feind zu infiltrieren. Mit Rückenstichen schaltet er gezielt den Feind aus und zerstört feindliche Selbstschussanlangen mit Störgeräten Marke Eigenbau.

Nun aber genug zu den einzelnen Klassen. Wie bereits gesagt ist das Spiel kostenlos verfügbar. Allerdings werden hier "In-game purchases" angeboten, um sich Waffen und Accessoires für die Klassen schneller besorgen zu können. Viele bezeichnen TF2 aufgrund seiner großen Auswahl an modischen Accessoires für die Charaktere als "Hut-Simulator" :D. Es besteht hier jedoch absolut kein Zwang, denn mit etwas Geduld bekommt man die Items auch per Zufall geschenkt.

Etwas, was TF2 einzigartig macht, ist, dass es sich selbst nicht ernst nimmt. In Zeiten, wo Ego-shooter oft nach realistischem Blutspritzen und Mega-hyper Grafik bewertet werden, ist TF2 eine wunderbare Alternative. Im gut umgesetzten Comic-look bekriegen sich die Teams mit teilweise suspekten Waffen (z.B. wer verprügelt den Gegner mit einer Makrele und übergießt Ihn mit einer Flasche Eigenurin?) in verschiedenen Game-Modi. Mit 'Flagge erobern', 'Loren-Wettrennen', 'Kontrollpunkt-Eroberungen' und weiteren Modi bietet TF2 verschiedene Möglichkeiten, seine freie Zeit zu investieren.

Alles in allem überzeugt TF2 mit seiner großen Auswahl an Klassen, Game-Modi und Items; und das kostenlos! Wer braucht schon realistische Kriegsszenarien, Foto-realistische Grafik und Assistenzhunde ( ;) ), wenn man prima ohne sie auskommen kann? TF2 ist etwas eigenes und nicht 'eines dieser Ballerspiele'. Probiert es einfach mal aus, es 'koscht ja nischt'.

14085584.review:
The vicious cycle of Team fortress 2

First when you'll arrive in the game, you'll want Weapons, tons of them.

Then you'll see that everyone has hats, and you'll want these, a tons of them.

Then you'll realize that hats doesn't matter, only skill count, so you'll want a lot of skills, tons of them.

Then new weapons will be added, and you'll want them, all of them.

Then a new hat will be added and you'll want it, cause it'll be fancy on your main class.

Then you'll realize again, that you don't give a damn about hats, all is about is skill.

Then when you have waited for 3 years, new weapons will be added, and you'll want them.

And then you realize that you spent  like 2000 hours of your life for this, met great friends, and you'll have a server where's you feeling like home, and you discovered so much things via the community, it learnt you so much.

Then the rude reality of life, bring you on earth, and this game is here, Waiting for you to play 1,2,3... hours, and you'll be happy to see that all your good friend are still there.
